thread.title: Mamadou Sakho Agrees Terms Over Deadline Day Loan Move to Crystal Palace
thread.title_full: Mamadou Sakho Agrees Terms Over Deadline Day Loan Move to Crystal Palace | 90min

author: Crystal Palace
title: Mamadou Sakho Agrees Terms Over Deadline Day Loan Move to Crystal Palace
text:
​London side Crystal Palace have reportedly agreed upon terms of a loan deal with Liverpool centre-back Mamadou Sakho.

The Frenchman has been left out on the fringes all of this campaign, having fallen out with manager Jurgen Klopp during the pre-season. After being cleared of a doping charge by UEFA, it was thought that he would find his way back into the fold, but the German boss made it quite clear, months ago, that there was no place in the side for Sakho.
Several clubs had been alerted by the possibility of signing the 26-year-old, but according to the  ​Telegraph's Matt Law , it's Palace who have won the race. Unwilling to pay the £20m that the Reds are demanding, they have opted to sign Sakho on a loan deal instead.

They have come to an agreement with the player, but have yet to agree on the move itself with Liverpool.

Liverpool fans are quite unhappy with Klopp's pricing Sakho out of a move, though, and have reacted quite angrily over social media as they believe that the club is ruining the player's career.
Klopp is ruining Sakho's career, who's gonna pay £20 mil for someone who hasn't played first team in a year
— a. (@aidensmxth) January 31, 2017 ​​
